name: Mitigation for Command and Scripting Interpreter Attack
description: This playbook addresses an incident involving the execution of unauthorized commands via a scripting language on a target host.

action--64f8c825-f6d3-46b0-bbcd-fe33eb8f.name: Kill malicious process
action--64f8c825-f6d3-46b0-bbcd-fe33eb8f.description: Terminate any processes running the malicious script.

parallel--34df62f9-bb97-4c8c-8ea7-eb9ca9.name: Monitor and Secure
parallel--34df62f9-bb97-4c8c-8ea7-eb9ca9.description: Actions to secure the host and monitor for further threats.

action--c906320d-5c8a-4f99-bb89-9c6e8eec.name: Block suspicious IP
action--c906320d-5c8a-4f99-bb89-9c6e8eec.description: Blocks incoming traffic from known malicious IP addresses.

action--a6e19657-ee71-414d-afc3-e476565e.name: Run a full antivirus scan
action--a6e19657-ee71-414d-afc3-e476565e.description: Scan the entire system for threats after incident detection.

loop--51e8e54c-125b-4500-8e3f-7d6d30708c.name: Check for threats
loop--51e8e54c-125b-4500-8e3f-7d6d30708c.description: Continue antivirus scanning until no threats are found.

action--b4f80d1c-2b38-4ccd-bc71-8e991acc.name: Review logs for abnormal activity
action--b4f80d1c-2b38-4ccd-bc71-8e991acc.description: Check the last 100 lines of the log file for suspicious commands or activities.

action--190c1c67-17a3-4666-8aeb-0059f51e.name: Update firewall rules
action--190c1c67-17a3-4666-8aeb-0059f51e.description: Update firewall settings to deny traffic from the known threat.
